name: Knights & Peasants
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: Knights & Peasants is a play-to-earn, medieval themed RPG idle game built on the Harmony blockchain. 5000 Knight NFT's have been minted and every holder earns our token. Knights can be upgraded to increase their daily income. Knights will also be able to quest for various rewards like Items and Peasants, to continuously progress their character.
